comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: On June 21, 2011, lochnessa1 suggested where this photo was taken; thank you for your efforts to #mapBK!

comment.author: 62094288@N00
comment._content: Looks more like Prospect Park to me. Any idea what that building in the background is?

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
We go by what's on the original photo envelope for the caption unless there's hard evidence it's in error. Unfortunately there are only two Fort Greene photos in this Brainerd set, so there's nothing else to compare it with here. Only the foreground is in focus, so figuring out what that building is (which could help ID the location) would be pretty tough.

So it goes with historical photographs!
Deb Wythe
Brooklyn Museum Digital Lab
